description: Web applications, written mostly in ASP.NET MVC but also in python and PHP.
Projects with mobile as a primary UI or those that utilize mobile devices in some way.
Everything close to the Metal. IOT, RasperryPI, Arduino and other technologies connected to hardware.
Gamedev tools, games and their engines.
All about (big) data, algorithms, math, statistics or AI in general.
Aplications dedicated to Windows, mostly Universal Windows Platform.
